instruction:
To add more user to this room share this page URL with your friends! (if you add some =))
After the game started, once you be add in it and after the dealer give you cards:

- Click on a card from your hand (this area) to play it.
- Click on a card from the playing area to take it back to your hand (yaniv or if you did a mistake).
- You can drag and drop a card from your hand to rearrange them by toggling the play/reorder switch
- You can right click on a card to see more action (hand, pile, deck, tricks...)
- If you ware expeld, in spectator mode, you can always ask to go back by refreshing the page
action-kit: Right click on exploding kitten to put it back
action-targeted-attack: Right click on the user you want to attack
rule-kit: Kit: Defuse an exploding kitten and put it back in the deck
rule-cat: Combo cards: 2 cards identical to steal a card, 3 to ask a card, 5 to choose a card from discard pile
rule-nope: Nope: Stop any action except for an Exploding Kitten or a Defuse Card
rule-skip: Skip: Immediately end your turn without drawing a card. (2 skips needed for an attack)
rule-attack: Attack: Do not draw any cards. Instead, immediately force the next player to take 2 turns in a row. An attack stop an attack and force next player to take 2 turns
rule-favor: Force any other player to give you 1 card from their hand. They choose which card to give you.
rule-see-the-future: See the future: Privately view the top 3 cards from the Draw Pile
rule-reverse: Reverse the order of play and end your turn without drawing a card.
rule-draw-from-the-bottom: End your turn by drawing the bottom card from the Draw Pile.
